channel.title: Remix your first song in auxy!
channel.description: So search your oldest FINISHED track and remix it. The winner gets a repost from a guy with 31 follows (me!) Track has to be 1:30 to 4:00 minutes You have to submit your track on the 25th of may and I’ll try to get the winner on the first of June Good luck!

item.title: Remix your first song in auxy!
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Been there done that… twice xD

This was the very first song I ever did in auxy, remixed from what I could make from the original parts in the old green version. It’s not very good as to be expected.
https://m.soundcloud.com/james-lucien-official/nano

And as E/E, I’ve remixed the first song I did twice now. Here’s the better of the two.
https://soundcloud.com/eslashe/dense-extended-mix

Read full topic
